@dev staking epoch start in weeks

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibBrokenLine.BrokenLine storage pointer,uint256,struct LibBrokenLine.Line memory,uint256)

documentation.text:
Ð¡alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula:
 staking = (tokens * (
      ST_FORMULA_CONST_MULTIPLIER
      + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod - minCliffPeriod))/(MAX_CLIFF_PERIOD - minCliffPeriod)
      + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod - minSlopePeriod))/(MAX_SLOPE_PERIOD - minSlopePeriod)
      )) / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER*

@notice method returns the amount of blocks to shift staking epoch to.
 By the time of development, the default weekly-epoch calculated by main-net block number
 would start at about 11-35 UTC on Tuesday
 we move it to 00-00 UTC Thursday by adding 10800 blocks (approx)
@dev Throws if stopped
@dev Throws if not stopped

attributes.text:
Ð¡alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula:
 staking = (tokens * (
      ST_FORMULA_CONST_MULTIPLIER
      + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod - minCliffPeriod))/(MAX_CLIFF_PERIOD - minCliffPeriod)
      + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod - minSlopePeriod))/(MAX_SLOPE_PERIOD - minSlopePeriod)
      )) / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER*

@notice method returns the amount of blocks to shift staking epoch to.
 By the time of development, the default weekly-epoch calculated by main-net block number
 would start at about 11-35 UTC on Tuesday
 we move it to 00-00 UTC Thursday by adding 10800 blocks (approx)
@dev Throws if stopped
@dev Throws if not stopped

Delegate(uint256,address,address,uint256.details: Emitted when to set newDelegate address for Lock with given id

Migrate(address,uint256[]).details: Emitted when migrate Locks with given id, account - msg.sender

Restake(uint256,address,address,uint256,.details: Emitted when change Lock parameters (newDelegate, newAmount, newSlope, newCliff) for Lock with given id

StakeCreate(uint256,address,address,uint.details: Emitted when create Lock with parameters (account, delegate, amount, slope, cliff)

StartMigration(address,address).details: StartMigration initiate migration to another contract, account - msg.sender, to - address delegate to

StartStaking(address).details: Start run contract functions, accept withdraw, account - msg.sender

StopStaking(address).details: Stop run contract functions, accept withdraw, account - msg.sender

Withdraw(address,uint256).details: Emitted when withdraw amount of Rari, account - msg.sender, amount - amount Rari

delegate(address).details: Delegates votes from the sender to `delegatee`.

delegates(address).details: Returns the delegate that `account` has chosen.

getPastTotalSupply(uint256).details: Returns the total supply of votes available at the end of a past block (`blockNumber`). NOTE: This value is the sum of all available votes, which is not necessarily the sum of all delegated votes. Votes that have not been delegated are still part of total supply, even though they would not participate in a vote.

getPastVotes(address,uint256).details: Returns the amount of votes that `account` had at the end of a past block (`blockNumber`).

getVotes(address).details: Returns the current amount of votes that `account` has.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

migrateTo.details: address to migrate Stakes to (zero if not in migration state)

minCliffPeriod.details: minimal cliff period in weeks, minCliffPeriod < MAX_CLIFF_PERIOD

minSlopePeriod.details: minimal slope period in weeks, minSlopePeriod < MAX_SLOPE_PERIOD

stopped.details: true if contract entered stopped state

getStake(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Ð¡alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula: staking = (tokens * (      ST_FORMULA_CONST_MULTIPLIER      + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod - minCliffPeriod))/(MAX_CLIFF_PERIOD - minCliffPeriod)      + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod - minSlopePeriod))/(MAX_SLOPE_PERIOD - minSlopePeriod)      )) / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER*
